item.title: Home Cinema Setup
item.description: I have been gradually adding parts to my PC so that it functions better for watching movies and gaming. Here are the components that I have used: Monitor – BenQ EX3501R 35″ Ultra WQHD Curved Monitor This monitor is great for watching movies and gaming as it is ultra-wide at an aspect radio of 21:9, 3440x1440, a VA panel with high contrast, and the monitor is slightly curved so that you get a cinematic experience.
